item.title: First post
item.description: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Montserrat&family=Open+Sans:wght@300;400&display=swap'); .movie-info{ display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-flow: row; position:relative; width:95%; height:240px; left:2%; margin 0 0 3% 0; } .poster{ max-width:auto; max-height:100%; position:relative; box-shadow: 2px 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.5); border-radius:5px; } .detail{ display:flex; flex-flow:column; background-color:#282e39; width:100%; position:relative; left:1.5%; border-radius:5px; } .detail .title{ position:relative; font-size:24pt; font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif; font-weight:400; color:white; line-height:0.1em; height:auto; } .detail .info{ display:flex; justify-content:space-around; font-size:10pt; font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif; font-weight:400; color:#e3e3e3; line-height:0.1em; margin: 0 0 0 0; } .detail .list{
